channel.title: What to do?
channel.description:
[img]http://gamerdestiny.co.uk/stats.png[/img]
I'm currently training combat, but I'm not sure what stats to get in order to make some money through rare drops. What do you think I should do?

item.title: What to do?
item.dc:creator: @Snackman Snackman
item.description:
@Snackman wrote:

Currently im 75 82 72, but low defence sucks :o so Like the elve age, don’t let ur defence down
and 60 at least is a good way to train yeah.
For a non member, training on hill giants can make u some money, although there are WAY to much players there (thanks to Jagex for the Entrances with dungeoneering :D.)

Read full topic

item.title: What to do?
item.dc:creator: @Saphire1 Saphire`
item.description:
@Saphire1 wrote:

[quote=“Davidi2, post:8, topic:395409”]I’ve never seen an account so obviously botted XD (not that there’s anything wrong with that)

But yea, get at least 60 in all melle stats[/quote]
Yeah, I’ll post an update on the account now.

[quote=“the elve age, post:9, topic:395409”][quote author=Saphire` link=topic=492594.msg3601883#msg3601883 date=1305673075]

Currently im 72/90/90, trust me having high defense rocks. (getting 80 attack while getting 80 dungeon)

Few questions, what equipment should I use? What monsters should I train on now? My combat is 59 as I’ve gained 58 attack, 53 strength and 45 defence.
[/quote]
Whats your ign? I’ll add you and give you some help.[/quote]
Empty your inbox a little, I’ll PM it to you then.

Read full topic

item.title: What to do?
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

[quote=“Saphire`, post:6, topic:395409”][quote author=the elve age link=topic=492594.msg3601785#msg3601785 date=1305664491]
Currently im 72/90/90, trust me having high defense rocks. (getting 80 attack while getting 80 dungeon)
[/quote]
Few questions, what equipment should I use? What monsters should I train on now? My combat is 59 as I’ve gained 58 attack, 53 strength and 45 defence.[/quote]
Get 60 attack.

Dragon scimitar or brackish blade
Rune, etc with berserk helm

Not much you can do except train atm. Don’t raise atk above 60 and def at all (at this point).

Read full topic
